title: I sent a gift and they didnt get it
body:
i sent out a gift to a friend of mine, and it took the rp i put in it, but they havent got it.
she is online and everything so it doesn't makes sense.

didn't give me the notification too

replies.body: Hey, I do see two gifts being sent to two different players.  One for Pool Party Lulu and Tango Evelynn.  If you'd like to confirm the recipients, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can offer context.
